com.chartboost.sdk

Class Chartboost

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chartboost.sdk.Chartboost

  • public class Chartboost
extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Chartboost.CBFramework
      Used with setFramework(final CBFramework framework) calls to set suffix for wrapper libraries like Unity or Corona.
      static class  Chartboost.CBMediation
      Used with setMediation(final CBMediation medation, final String libraryVersion) calls to set suffix for wrapper libraries like Unity or Corona.
      static class  Chartboost.CBPIDataUseConsent
      GDPR compliance settings: UNKNOWN(-1) means the publisher hasn't implemented functionality or the user has the option to not answer NO_BEHAVIORAL(0) means the user does not consent to targeting (Contextual ads) YES_BEHAVIORAL(1) means the user consents (Behavioral and Contextual Ads)

      static void startWithAppId(android.app.Activity activity, java.lang.String appId, java.lang.String appSignature)
      Start Chartboost with required appId, appSignature and delegate.This method must be executed before any other Chartboost SDK methods can be used.

    • Method Detail

      • startWithAppId

        public static void startWithAppId(android.app.Activity activity,
                                  java.lang.String appId,
                                  java.lang.String appSignature)
        Start Chartboost with required appId, appSignature and delegate.This method must be executed before any other Chartboost SDK methods can be used. Once executed this call will also controll session tracking and background tasks used by Chartboost.
        Parameters:
        activity - Android Activity activity instance.
        appId - The Chartboost application ID for this application.
        appSignature - The Chartboost application signature for this application.

      • setPIDataUseConsent

        public static void setPIDataUseConsent(android.content.Context context,
                                       Chartboost.CBPIDataUseConsent consent)
        GDPR Compliance method with which you can limit our SDK's data collection. You should call this method *before* calling Chartboost.startWithAppId() to ensure that our SDK, as well as dependencies such as Moat, will be restricted.

      • getPIDataUseConsent

        public static Chartboost.CBPIDataUseConsent getPIDataUseConsent()
        Gets the GDPR status.

      • restrictDataCollection

        @Deprecated
public static void restrictDataCollection(android.content.Context context,
                                                      boolean restrict)
        Deprecated. 
        Use setPIDataUseConsent(Context,CBPIDataUseConsent) instead. If you pass in a true value, it will equal to Chartboost.CBPIDataUseConsent.NO_BEHAVIORAL, while a false value will mean Chartboost.CBPIDataUseConsent.UNKNOWN.

      • onCreate

        public static void onCreate(android.app.Activity activity)
        Required method: MUST be called by the host activity in its onCreate method. Sets up Chartboost to run in your activity.
        Parameters:
        activity - : the host activity

      • onStart

        public static void onStart(android.app.Activity activity)
        Required method: MUST called by the host activity in its onStart() method. Lets Chartboost know that an activity using Chartboost has appeared.
        Parameters:
        activity - The host activity

      • onResume

        public static void onResume(android.app.Activity activity)
        [VIDEO ONLY] Required method: MUST called by the host activity in its onResume() method. Lets Chartboost know that an activity using Chartboost has been resumed.
        Parameters:
        activity - The host activity

      • onPause

        public static void onPause(android.app.Activity activity)
        [VIDEO ONLY] Required method: MUST called by the host activity in its onPause() method. Lets Chartboost know that an activity using Chartboost has been paused.
        Parameters:
        activity - The host activity

      • onStop

        public static void onStop(android.app.Activity activity)
        Required method: MUST called by the host activity in its onStop() method. Lets Chartboost know that an activity using Chartboost has disappeared.
        Parameters:
        activity - The host activity

      • onBackPressed

        public static boolean onBackPressed()
        Required method: MUST called by the host activity in its onBackPressed() method.
        Returns:
        true if the event has been handled, false if the host activity should handle it.

      • hasRewardedVideo

        public static boolean hasRewardedVideo(java.lang.String location)
        Check rewarded interstitial cache with a location argument
        Parameters:
        location - The location within the app
        Returns:
        True if a rewarded video is cached.

      • cacheRewardedVideo

        public static void cacheRewardedVideo(java.lang.String location)
        Cache an rewarded interstitial with a default location argument
        Parameters:
        location - The location for the Chartboost impression type.

      • showRewardedVideo

        public static void showRewardedVideo(java.lang.String location)
        Load an rewarded interstitial with a default location argument Even if the rewarded interstitial is already cached, it is shown asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        location - The location for the Chartboost impression type.

      • hasInterstitial

        public static boolean hasInterstitial(java.lang.String location)
        Check interstitial cache with a location argument
        Parameters:
        location - The location for the Chartboost impression type.
        Returns:
        True if an interstitial is cached.

      • cacheInterstitial

        public static void cacheInterstitial(java.lang.String location)
        Cache an interstitial with a location argument
        Parameters:
        location - The location for the Chartboost impression type.

      • showInterstitial

        public static void showInterstitial(java.lang.String location)
        Load an interstitial with a location argument. Even if the interstitial is already cached, it is shown asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        location - The location for the Chartboost impression type.

      • closeImpression

        @Deprecated
public static void closeImpression()
        Deprecated. This method and its functionality are no-op and it will be removed in a future release
        Close the visible impression on the screen. If no impression is visible on the screen, this is no-op

      • hasMoreApps

        public static boolean hasMoreApps(java.lang.String location)
        Deprecated. Support for MoreApps has been removed as of SDK 7.
        Check more apps cache
        Parameters:
        location - The location for the Chartboost impression type.
        Returns:
        True if a More Apps impression is cached.

      • cacheMoreApps

        public static void cacheMoreApps(java.lang.String location)
        Deprecated. Support for MoreApps has been removed as of SDK 7.
        Cache more apps with a default location argument Even if the more apps page is already cached, it is shown asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        location - The location for the Chartboost impression type.

      • showMoreApps

        public static void showMoreApps(java.lang.String location)
        Deprecated. Support for MoreApps has been removed as of SDK 7.
        Load more apps with a default location argument Even if the more apps page is already cached, it is shown asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        location - The location for the Chartboost impression type.

      • isAnyViewVisible

        public static boolean isAnyViewVisible()
        Check to see if any chartboost ad views are visible
        Returns:
        false if no views are visibe and true if any views are visible

      • setMediation

        public static void setMediation(Chartboost.CBMediation mediation,
                                java.lang.String libraryVersion)
        Set a mediation library.
        Parameters:
        mediation - The mediation library to send with all Chartboost API server requests.
        libraryVersion - The mediation library version This is an internal method used via Chartboost's mediation partners to track their usage. Please use the setFramework(CBFramework framework, String version) method

      • setFramework

        public static void setFramework(Chartboost.CBFramework framework,
                                java.lang.String version)
        Set a custom framework.
        Parameters:
        framework - The framework to send with all Chartboost API server requests.
        version - The version of the framework This is an internal method used via Chartboost's Unity and Corona SDKs to track their usage.

      • setFrameworkVersion

        @Deprecated
public static void setFrameworkVersion(java.lang.String version)
        Deprecated. Use setChartboostWrapperVersion instead
        Set a custom framework SDK version to append to the POST body of every request. This is useful for analytics and provides chartboost with important information.
        Parameters:
        version - The version of the framework SDK. This is an internal method used via Chartboost's Unity and Corona SDKs to track their usage.

      • setChartboostWrapperVersion

        public static void setChartboostWrapperVersion(java.lang.String version)
        Set a custom framework SDK version to append to the POST body of every request. This is useful for analytics and provides chartboost with important information.
        Parameters:
        version - The version of the framework SDK. This is an internal method used via Chartboost's Unity and Corona SDKs to track their usage.

      • getCustomId

        public static java.lang.String getCustomId()
        Get the current custom identifier being sent in the POST body for all Chartboost API server requests. Use this method to get the custom identifier that can be used later in the Chartboost dashboard to group information by.
        Returns:
        The identifier being sent with all Chartboost API server requests.

      • setCustomId

        public static void setCustomId(java.lang.String customID)
        Set a custom identifier to send in the POST body for all Chartboost API server requests.
        Parameters:
        customID - The identifier to send with all Chartboost API server requests. Use this method to set a custom identifier that can be used later in the Chartboost dashboard to group information by.

      • setLoggingLevel

        public static void setLoggingLevel(com.chartboost.sdk.Libraries.CBLogging.Level lvl)
        Set the Chartboost SDK logging level.
        Parameters:
        lvl - The logging level.

      • getLoggingLevel

        public static com.chartboost.sdk.Libraries.CBLogging.Level getLoggingLevel()
        Returns:
        The current Chartboost SDK logging level.

      • getDelegate

        public static com.chartboost.sdk.AbstractChartboostDelegate getDelegate()
        Returns:
        the delegate object currently used by Chartboost.

      • setDelegate

        public static void setDelegate(ChartboostDelegate delegate)
        WARNING: usually you should just use onCreate(android.app.Activity) for the functionality provided by this method. This directly sets the delegate object used by Chartboost.
        Parameters:
        delegate - The delegate to set.

      • getAutoCacheAds

        public static boolean getAutoCacheAds()
        Return whether or not a new impression of the same type and location is automatically cached when one is shown. (default: true)
        Returns:
        True if auto caching is enabled

      • setAutoCacheAds

        public static void setAutoCacheAds(boolean autoCacheAds)
        Sets whether or not a new impression of the same type and location is automatically cached when one is shown. (default: true) This method has no effect if called before startWithAppId has been called.
        Parameters:
        autoCacheAds - If True, a new impression will automatically be cached.

      • setShouldRequestInterstitialsInFirstSession

        public static void setShouldRequestInterstitialsInFirstSession(boolean shouldRequest)
        Decide if Chartboost SDK should show interstitials in the first session.
        Parameters:
        shouldRequest - Default is true. Set to control if Chartboost SDK can show interstitials in the first session. The session count is controlled via the startWithAppId:appSignature:delegate: method in the Chartboost class.

      • setShouldDisplayLoadingViewForMoreApps

        public static void setShouldDisplayLoadingViewForMoreApps(boolean shouldDisplay)
        Deprecated. Support for MoreApps has been removed as of SDK 7.
        Decide if Chartboost SDK should show a loading view while preparing to display the "more applications" UI.
        Parameters:
        shouldDisplay - Default is false. Set to control if Chartboost SDK should show a loading view while preparing to display the "more applications" UI.

      • setShouldPrefetchVideoContent

        public static void setShouldPrefetchVideoContent(boolean shouldPrefetch)
        Decide if Chartboost SDK will attempt to fetch videos from the Chartboost API servers.
        Parameters:
        shouldPrefetch - Default is true. Set to control if Chartboost SDK control if videos should be prefetched.

      • getSDKVersion

        public static java.lang.String getSDKVersion()
        Returns:
        Returns the current version of the Chartboost SDK

      • setShouldHideSystemUI

        public static void setShouldHideSystemUI(java.lang.Boolean hide)
        Decide if Chartboost Views should hide the status and navigation bars when being shown
        Parameters:
        hide - default is true. Make sure you change the theme of the Chartboost activity to android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent"

      • isWebViewEnabled

        public static boolean isWebViewEnabled()

      • setActivityCallbacks

        public static void setActivityCallbacks(boolean enabled)

      • setActivityAttrs

        public static void setActivityAttrs(android.app.Activity activity)
